_header: Father and Son and Holy Ghost / We knowledge Thee in every coast
_description: James Ryman, ‘Te deum verum laudamus’ — six quatrains (aaab) including refrain, ‘Te deum verum laudamus,’ and burden: ‘Alpha et o quem vocamus / Te deum verum laudamus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
ffader and sonne & holigoostWe knowlege the in euery
                    coost…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Sith thy seruauntis in euery costTe deum verum
                        laudamus
